Option.Name: Sightless Vision
Option.Description: Melittos can perceive their surroundings without needing light, and they never suffer penalties on combat or Perception checks due to darkness or other environmental factors that affect vision

Option.Name: Reliant on Toxins
Option.Description: Melittos require the toxins of their native atmosphere to live; offworld, they gain free special respirators to emulate the conditions of their homeworld. They treat standard planetary air composition as a corrosive atmosphere with rating 6 (see page 228 of the [B]Age of Rebellion[b] Core Rulebook).
